title: Building height permitted i
clause_text: Building height permitted i.e. Above Ground level (AGL) shall be calculated as CCZM height minus the site elevation of the plot. Height of building (AGL)=CCZM height – site elevation.
section: Height restrictions in the vicinity of aerodromes

source_pdf.text_snippet: Building height permitted i.e. Above Ground level (AGL) shall be calculated as CCZM height minus the site elevation of the plot. Height of building (AGL)=CCZM height – site elevation.
